        public static final int GLOBAL_UNIFORM

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid(int gridWidth,
            int gridHeight,
            boolean torus,
            int neighbourhoodType,
            int neighbourhoodExtent)
        Create the grid.
        Parameters:
        gridWidth, - gridHeight the width and height of the grid.
        torus - if true, the grid wraps around.
        neighbourhoodType - the type of neighbourhood: VON_NEUMANN , MOORE or GLOBAL_UNIFORM.
        neighbourhoodExtent - the radius of the neighbourhood.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid neighbourhoodType.

        Randomly chooses a neighbour.
        Parameters:
        x, - y the coordinates of the active agent.
        Returns:
        a randomly chosen neighbour of the active agent.
